Directory Listing of Routines

    projects/cluster/whisper

  • CL_LOAD_WHI
    Load data from the Waves of High Frequency and Sounder for Probing of Density by Relaxation (WHISPER)

Routine Descriptions

CL_LOAD_WHI

 [List of Routines] 
 PROCEDURE:
         cl_load_whi
         
 PURPOSE:
         Load data from the Waves of High Frequency and Sounder for Probing of Density by Relaxation (WHISPER)
 
 KEYWORDS:
         trange:       time range of interest [starttime, endtime] with the format
                       ['YYYY-MM-DD','YYYY-MM-DD'] or to specify more or less than a day
                       ['YYYY-MM-DD/hh:mm:ss','YYYY-MM-DD/hh:mm:ss']
         probes:       list of probes, valid values for Cluster probes are ['1','2','3','4'].
                       if no probe is specified the default is probe '1'
 OUTPUT:
 
 
 EXAMPLE:
 
 
 NOTES:
